original: 該據點當前的太守武將，影響據點發展以及阻擋敵方武將計謀。<color=#FFE9D6>管理能力</color>能夠強化幕僚工作能力，<color=#FFE9D6>智力</color>越高據點發展速度越高；<color=#FFE9D6>智力</color>越高越能阻擋敵方計謀。
text: The current prefect of the stronghold, affecting the development of the stronghold and blocking the strategy of the enemy generals. <color=#FFE9D6>Management ability</color> can strengthen the staff's ability to work, the higher the <color=#FFE9D6>intelligence</color> the higher the development speed of the base; the higher the <color=#FFE9D6>the intelligence</color> The more you can stop the enemy's tactics.
